rows.label: tev012701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Fosdyke about the White Whale's crew.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012701_MSG0001
rows.name:
The crew of the White Whale was composed of various
specialists thought capable of enduring the rigors of
space travel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012701_MSG0003
rows.name:
At the moment I am merely a poet adrift in this
strange world. But as a star sailor, my skills were
second to none.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012701_MSG0004
rows.name:
Every resident of this city is a master of some crucial
skillâ€”even the ones who didn't join BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012701_MSG0005
rows.name:
They've all been assigned to the duty that best suits
their talents, and are now working for the good of
New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012701_MSG0006
rows.name:
Of course, not everyone was willing to play their role.
You can still find a few odd drop-outs like myself
if you know where to look.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012701_MSG0009
rows.name:
I take it you're a BLADE?
I was one myself, until recently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012701_MSG0010
rows.name:
But things happened, and I ended up leaving BLADE.
Now I live my life composing poetry that no one's
interested in buying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012701_MSG0011
rows.name:
What about you? Would you care to purchase a
copy of my poetry anthology, "The Celeste Three"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012701_MSG0012
rows.name:
Each poem is a shimmering nugget of dream-stuff
condensed from the rich inspirations I've found on Mira!
I'm quite sure you'd enjoy it.[ST:wait ]
